topic.title: Custom Validation of Ant Build Files

body.p: If you need to validate an Ant build file with a validation engine that is different from the built-in engine, you can configure external engines as custom Ant validation engines in the preferences. After a custom validation engine is properly configured, it can be applied on the current document by selecting it from the list of custom validation engines in the Validation toolbar drop-down list. The document is validated against the schema declared in the document.
